General.Name: AB Panevezio Statybos Trestas
General.Description: AB Panevezio Statybos Trestas, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the design and construction of buildings, structures, equipment, communications, and other facilities and networks in Lithuania and internationally. It operates through four segments: Construction, Metal Structures, Panel Houses, and Other Activity. The Construction segment provides construction, design, and installation of various buildings, structures, devices, and communications. The segment also is involved in electrical installation works, renovation of buildings, installation of plumbing, sewage and fire protection systems, video surveillance systems, and security and fire alarm systems. The Metal Structures segment offers design, and manufacture of metal structures for construction purposes, as well as supplies metal structures to various companies. The Panel Houses segment is involved in design, production, construction, and installation of prefabricated houses; and production of wooden structures and carpentry. The Other activity segment engages in real estate development and rental; wholesale trade of building materials; production of aluminum constructions; and installation of concrete floors, as well as heating, ventilation, and air-conditioning systems in buildings. It undertakes industrial, public, cultural heritage, and residential projects. The company also engages in design, start-up, and adjustment of building engineering systems; installation of internal water supply; real estate preparation and sale; and production of aluminium profile systems and aluminium framed windows and doors. The company was founded in 1957 and is based in Panevezys, Lithuania.
